Litecoin Summit (LIVE) --   The lightning network will support multiple cryptocurrencies, potentially leveraging the increased capacity of the Litecoin network for channel creation.   LN will also be able to utilize submarine swaps to swap Bitcoin and Litecoin decentralised.
